website_summaries.verdict: Trades away some sturdiness for more convenient snap-away blades and a budget price point.
pros: Relatively well-built handle for a disposable utility knife
cons: Blades are somewhat difficult to snap away
Also, blades aren’t sharp enough for heavier materials

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!! The knife came apart ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! The knife came apart in my hand as I was using it and cut my finger very badly.... severed a ligament. Cheaply made and will fall apart on you and cut you. I’m sitting in the ER right now. 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the pricing fool you. These are decent utility knives. The plastic is stout and built tough with good ergonomics. Fits well in my gorilla-like size 8-1/2 hands. The blade slides easily and is surrounded by a metal shield. The lock button works as it should, although it does take a bit of finess. The knife uses standard 18mm blades. The blades change easily as the entire knife breaks down into 4 parts. My only quibble is that the end cap doesn't have a slot to snap off a blade section. An excellent utility knife!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  🚑 & Jeff's Wife 💅Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Utility knife review
customer_reviews.text: I use these for opening boxes and they work well for that purpose. They are well made and the blades are sharp and sturdy. The handle is easy to hold and allows for good control while using the knife. The slide switch is easy to use and has enough grip to keep the blade from moving. I like that you get 3 in the pack and the bright color makes it easy to find in a drawer. I would definitely recommend these box cutters.
customer_reviews.author: JPTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Sharp blade, retracts easily for protection.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to cut hard plastic pressure wrap from small items, small boxed items as well as thick, heavy shipping boxes. Very easy to use, just slide the bar to open/close. A very good value. Most pleased with this purchase. 04-25-2017 Continue to use frequently. I like that the blade can be adjusted somewhat to uncover just a small point, so as not to cut too deep to prevent piercing packaged items. If heavier cardboard, just push blade farther out.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 3 work great, but one of them is defective
customer_reviews.text: 2 of 3 work great, but one of them is defective. It seems there are 2 screws holding the black metal blade guide to the green plastic. One of the screws is too long and interferes with the blade lock mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude73

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without these?
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to move, they are super sharp and come with snap off heads so you can get a fresh blade. I use them to cut EVERYTHING now. Forget my scissors (unless it is fabric for sewing or hair) am using these EVERY day, post move. Great price, great product. Even if you are not moving, buy these--you will use them every day--plastic coverings on food, security plastic on bottles, string hanging from your clothes etc etc etc
customer_reviews.author: lcb

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal for Three Good Ones
customer_reviews.text: These have been so great to have around. I recycle any boxes that can't be reused and some can be hard to just tear up to fit in the bags I take recycling in car for drop off place. These have allowed me to cut boxes down quickly and very precisely. Also opening mail in boxes with a lot of tape. I have stored away the extra two so in case the first one breaks, but so far so good. May just give the other two to my adult kids.
customer_reviews.author: Toy Diva

customer_reviews.title: Bright green box cutters
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with my utility knives disappearing so I bought 3. These are a little big, but they are bright and easy to use. I'll know when someone in this household steals another of my knives! I'll just buy another 3 pack! I would like to see these in pink...LOL! Not many guys would steal pink ones! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Margie from Florida

customer_reviews.title: I like it but the blade does not lock.
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side: Easy to extend & retract the blade. Comfortable shape to the handle. Sturdy for something made of plastic. On the minus side: The button to extend the blade does not have a lock setting, so you can extend it accidentally. You could not safely carry this in your pocket. Also, the comfortable shape of the grip is somewhat offset by the position of the button, because when I grip the handle firmly, I have accidentally pressed the button that makes the blade extend. However, it is a pretty good box knife for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Clothes Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Good for cutting boxes, but be careful
customer_reviews.text: These worked well, but the locking mechanism didn’t work once or twice and I almost cut myself. There was very possibly some operator error, but just be careful, these are not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: USA123

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but sharp cutters
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are super sharp, easy to operate, and feel sturdy and "safe" in my hand. I order lots of stuffs from Amazon and other online retailers, so these got used very often. I sometimes misplace them, so it's great that they come in a 3-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Banana P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Household Use
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy-duty as some utility knives but lightweight and ideal for household use. It is my go-to utility knife for breaking down boxes and cutting materials. The easiest knife I have every used in terms of deploying and retrieving the blade. Very fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Stockman

customer_reviews.title: High visibility-quality cutter.  3 because, you know, you need them in multiple places or lose them like me.
customer_reviews.text: If I can't see or find a tool, I can't use a tool. Starting to go with more and more bright colors. This is a solid knife and I don't get the feeling that it'll start "slipping" or accident'y pulling the blade in out out. Reasonable price for what appears to be a quality cutter.
customer_reviews.author: K. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Netbabe
customer_reviews.text: These are working beautifully. I have one in the garage, one in crafts room & one in reserve. They look a little flimsey but don't feel like it when in use. I recommend them for light home or school use; maybe not industrial.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic retractable utility knife!
customer_reviews.text: I inherited a smaller version of this knife from my father and have been looking for one ever since then. I love them!! They are so convenient and the blade is easy for me to use. The best part is that the blade can be easily retracted into the handle, and when it gets dull, you just carefully break off the end and you have a new blade right there!
customer_reviews.author: Marje

customer_reviews.title: Handy Box Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Works good on opening boxes and pet food bags. Like the way the retractable blade opens and closes easily. The set of 3 is handy as I have them stashed in several different rooms for quick access. I no longer have to search for by husband's box cutters! Plus the bright color makes them easy to spot. A time saver!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly  B. Santo

customer_reviews.title: SO great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Items came ope in the ba..g No biggie...WHY did I not get these years ago...My life just got that much easier..Zipping through bacon packages all the plastic wrap food comes in and tape and everything!!! I order a lot online This is so freekin' great..I had another box cutter but never thought to use it duh!!....I have one in 3 rooms and have used them all already..LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Great set. I'm a gal
customer_reviews.text: Great set. I'm a gal, and these utility knives are great for cutting lots of things. Poster board, trimming window film and even cutting big Amazon boxes to smaller squares for recycling. And who doesn't struggle Amazon's air-filled plastic... one swipe, poof no more air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through cardboard like butter. They are very light and easy to retract. I cut long strips of cardboard for crafts, have cut about 150 strips with each cutter. and I am on the first tip, none have broken or dulled to the point of breaking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie L. Romero

customer_reviews.title: fine for plastic-bodied utility knives
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fine utility knives. Because the main body is plastic they are not the sturdiest feeling things, but they get the job done. We are mostly using them for things like thin plastic, cardboard, and foamcore, and so far they have been up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: really good. Strong
customer_reviews.text: Buy. These. Knives. They are really, really good. Strong, sharp as heck, easy to handle, I'd give them 10 stars if I could. If you've ever bought the crappy little ones with break off blades from harbor freight or somewhere, these are the well designed big brothers who work great!!! I'll but replacement blades also, and already bought 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer dude

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. These are amazingly sharp, like Adamantium claws if you catch my nerd-flow. Made short work of my cache of Amazon cardboard boxes, cutting them like butter and making them into smaller pieces for my recycle bin. Time will tell how long they hold up but at least I have spares with this 3-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: I put one of these box cutters to the test a few days after receiving them, and I was not disappointed. Although the plastic encasing the blade seems a little shabby, the device held up for cutting huge boxes with very little effort on my part.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Could not find decent ones at Loews/Hone Depot. The slider was in a bad location making it difficult to close the blade. This one is easy to use and you get three for a decent price. I have them strategically placed around the house for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hades9391

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use - at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Our facility opens a LOT of packages....these utility knives are sturdy and easy to use, with a large grip and easy-to-see neon green color. I have tried other utility knives since, but always go back to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: CA Chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Great value, this is what you're looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Can't have too many of these around the house, always nice to know i can open any of those annoying plastic packages. These aren't the most sturdy, but I like the green color and they stay pretty sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Chism

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little sharper, but overall good! I like that it came with 3. Needed them for the kid's project. Works great cutting milk cartons.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Great utility knife
customer_reviews.text: Their knives but they work quite well for cutting boxes and don't get dull very quickly I have literally cut hundreds of boxes with one and it is still going strong. The fact that there are 3 is great. The neon is great so you don't leave the sharp knife lying around especially with pets or kids.
customer_reviews.author: tmybrgr

customer_reviews.title: best choice
customer_reviews.text: 3 box cutter utility knives, better than buying blades as the knife is often lost before I can use the refills. I also needed an extra knife. The blades were very sharp with sturdy click mechanism which holds the blade in position.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lim

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, but also very thin blades that snap easily. However, it's overall what I expected and helps me cut through boxes, even with a hand that is weak from nerve damage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brodnex

customer_reviews.title: Cuts really smoothly; great value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many box cutters and these are by far my favorite. They cut very smoothly, and can be extended quite far. Also at their price they are a fantastic value; I’ve purchased them multiple times. Handle with care; the blade is sharp and can cut you easily. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joey B.

customer_reviews.title: Best utility knife for this size blade I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have six of these. I use them all day, every in the sign business. Best utility knife for this size blade I have used, and I have used a lot. They are durable, feel great, have solid click mechanism, and are easy to spot! Great deal. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sven-O

customer_reviews.title: Great mechanism for locking blade
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good, lightweight boxcutter. The rocker mechanism for locking/retracting the blade is really clever and intuitive. Nice, tight tolerance for the blade housing so it doesn't bend or twist when you're exerting a lot of cutting pressure. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: modland

customer_reviews.title: They're sharp which is good. Two of them work perfectly and would have ...
customer_reviews.text: They're sharp which is good. Two of them work perfectly and would have gotten 5 stars but the slider on the third one broke after four or five uses.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are even better quality than I expected. They are nice and sharp and get the job done quickly! They are also easy to hold because of their shape. I feel like they are safer than the old traditional cutter I was using. Very pleased with purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY FORGET ALL THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: There's no locking problem, it locks fine as long as you aren't putting pressing on the locking hold. The blades are incredibly sharp. It's a great value for the price, I did a whole cardboard project with these, and now i open packages with EASE.
customer_reviews.author: Jocey

customer_reviews.title: Great to open Amazon packages!
customer_reviews.text: Handy size and lightweight. Put them around the house to open packages from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Needed several to help with unpacking a long distance move. Proved to be just right for this project. Really sharp knives and break off point were very handy. Ordered again
customer_reviews.author: E. Shivvers

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical of these plastic box cutters being strong ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of these plastic box cutters being strong enough, but the blade cage on these is METAL.
customer_reviews.author: American Ninja Nerdier

customer_reviews.title: The cutting blade cuts like butter.
customer_reviews.text: I have put it to the test at work in a warehouse and it is a solid product. I have dropped it several times, and it did not break and there no scratches. It is lightweight and the ratchet works well. The cutting blade cuts like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice BC much sturdier than the ordinary BC and still ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice BC much sturdier than the ordinary BC and still lightweight but his makes it about 70% thicker than an ordinary inexpensive BC which may be a concern for some people
customer_reviews.author: A C Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to spot!!
customer_reviews.text: They are lightweight and super sharp. I wasn't sure I needed three - but not I don't have to go searching for one as I am putting them in the area where I need them most!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Word

customer_reviews.title: Excellent box cutters
customer_reviews.text: Excellent box cutters, handles grip perfectly, slide controls work smoothly, nice extra hole for a string to hang up, all-around good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Useful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use with art projects. Used it for cleaning ceramic cook top, opening packages, and expect will find other uses. Sturdy. Comfortable to hold . Easy to extend and retract blade.
customer_reviews.author: Conikins

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for everything from opening boxes to opening food packages and letters. I keep one in my office desk, one in the kitchen and (oddly) one in the bathroom. Very useful!
customer_reviews.author: BMath001

customer_reviews.title: So far.... so good!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly & they work great. Nice to have a set sharp blades that I don't have to fumble with during replacement. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: RonP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great to open and break down boxes. Anyone complaining about the ability to lock/unlock these simple tools is pretty foolish. They are easy to use and very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: JRL

customer_reviews.title: Blades work fine but handle hurts
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this five stars as the knives seem to be fine, but something in their design makes it so that I get blisters nearly every time I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Dont last very long
customer_reviews.text: Meant for use every now and then not for constantly cutting boxes for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a slight Amazon Prime-aholic. ..and by slight I mean my mud room is filled with boxes. These make it super easy to break down boxes plus I don't have to use kitchen knives to open them up. Safety feature is easy to use to move the blade when I'm done using it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexiss

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: They are stronger than the other less expensive ones. I like having these because I always have a nice sharp blade for whatever. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Orte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Box cutters are well made, very shart and should last for a long time. Good price and fast shipping, I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: good to have 3
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent box cutters. I like having 3 of them because I keep one in the kitchen one in the garage and one in my workroom. I don't have to go looking for them
customer_reviews.author: Hal E. Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap- ya get what you pay for in this case ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap- ya get what you pay for in this case. The blades do not retract well- leaving very dangerous small tip out. They break instantly. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected for Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Heftier than expected. While not equal to other cutter utility knives we own it far exceeded our expectations. They served the purpose for which they were purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Zapples

customer_reviews.title: the blades are perfect for what I need them for
customer_reviews.text: First ordered around August 28th and they never showed up. I decided to give them a second chance and reordered them after being refunded from the first purchase, The package came this time, but one of the blades were out and cut through the package and the container they were shipped through. On another note, the blades are perfect for what I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Cinbin1990

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good box cutters for the price. I like that you get 3 of them. Blades are not as sharp as others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: No wonder these got such great ratings. They are one of the best utility knives I have used. Will only buy these from now on. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce T.

customer_reviews.title: Knife
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, very sharp. I wish it had a clip to hook onto my pants or something.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Peters

customer_reviews.title: just OK
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands and they are a bit bulky. also do not have a clip for a belt holder. Very sharp, and do lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra R. Shane

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blade
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sharp blade and easy to hold Great utility knife around the house
customer_reviews.author: K Hastings

customer_reviews.title: I love these blades!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these blades!! My crew keeps taking them from me and i keep buying more. We use these daily at work and they're very sharp and handy. The bright color is easy to spot among the cargo and boxes we have in the warehouse. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Green

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several orders of these box cutters, they are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: PAS- Paradise Arcade Shop LLC

customer_reviews.title: It was just what I as looking for. I've ...
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I as looking for. I've used them far beyond that of a box cutter e.g. cutting tile flooring squares to needed size.
customer_reviews.author: Janice J. Perry

customer_reviews.title: can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: These knives are just a little bit hard to open and close, but they work well and are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppermom

customer_reviews.title: I asked for 3 Box Cutters, and I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I asked for 3 Box Cutters, and I got 3 Bux Cutters. The Box cutters also have a breakaway to allow you use a blade for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Supertool
customer_reviews.text: These are super tools. Cut through heavy cardboard like it was butter. Going to last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Autrey

customer_reviews.title: excellent utility knife
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, sturdy, easy to use, safe, and strong. I am so glad I got these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Utility knife
customer_reviews.text: Works well, able to safely open boxes...Blade retracts to keep blade safely in the handle
customer_reviews.author: P. Dobrick

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs these
customer_reviews.text: Every home should have these. They make opening boxes a breeze, and I keep finding new uses for them. No more wearing down my steak knives.
customer_reviews.author: WanderingReader

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this box cutter. It is stronger than I expected. I use daily in the kitchen. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Vviti

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smooth sliding open and closed motion
customer_reviews.text: Works great, smooth sliding open and closed motion. Good price. 100% satisfied with this purchase so far. Only thing I haven't done yet is remove a blade.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Carriger

customer_reviews.title: A cut above (pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: Much better and more durable than the cheaper ones that look similar.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Neon Green Sticks Out
customer_reviews.text: They work as expected, the brighter color helps you find them and helps you not miss them if they are around.
customer_reviews.author: Rich and Dixie

customer_reviews.title: I assumed this would hold up well, but one ...
customer_reviews.text: I assumed this would hold up well, but one of the knives broke in less than a week. you get what you pay for though.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Good locking knife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife lock stays in place really welll.......only dislike is no storage for extra blades.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Great blade. No issues.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks exactly like the picture. Also this is not for left handed people.
customer_reviews.author: Dezzi Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Great box cutter
customer_reviews.text: Great value and works perfectly for me. Easy to find with bright green color.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This box cutters work perfectly, and for the price, you just cant beat that.....I highly recommend it....
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty durable they lasted me a long time .
customer_reviews.author: Roger C Lizama

customer_reviews.title: Better than the store varitey.
customer_reviews.text: These are great box cutters, better than the store bought kind. Blade stays looked and it doesn't fall apart. I will continue to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: They work well and there’s 3 incase one breaks/gets dull
customer_reviews.text: They work great and despite the “cheap” look and feel to them, they are efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Best box cutters yet!
customer_reviews.text: Best box cutters ever! Great price, very sturdy, and easy to use. What's not to like? Beats the cheap ones that have come out lately that are not a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: MortgageMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For The Money
customer_reviews.text: I spend years and a lot of money buying those cheap rzor/box cutters that fell apart after a week. These knives are very sturdy and eependable. They are well worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Quietmann

customer_reviews.title: "Razor Sharp"; )... on a serious ...
customer_reviews.text: "Razor Sharp" ;) ... on a serious note, they work well but the blade doesn't lock-in well and will move if cutter thicker items such as foam.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy and safe to use. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Berry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for price,
customer_reviews.text: Easy tower with, a little flimsy, nice feeling, look forward to more initial use.
customer_reviews.author: Jaap

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boss at work and liked it so much I ordered for home as well. Fits my dainty hand and is easy to retract. My husband is also a fan. Win, win.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product and love the easy to spot color.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest box cutters but they do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte B.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These function very well. Very sharp and blades slide in and out very easily.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Supplier only boxed two of the cutters.. bag was cut open on the side . Missing one cutter!
customer_reviews.author: UPSTATE NY

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described and no issues with performance. Nice and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dan O.

customer_reviews.title: The issue I had was the blade would side back ...
customer_reviews.text: The issue I had was the blade would side back if there was a moderate amount of pressure from the front. The feel was ok, I did feel it was a safety hazard
customer_reviews.author: JOnathan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Lasted through two years of use. The blades snap off unevenly but that wasn’t an issue as they still got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P

customer_reviews.title: No issues at all.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as displayed. Soon as these arrived I found two box cutters I purchased a while ago.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not very smooth. Sometimes needs a little force to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very smooth. Sometimes needs a little force to take out the blade. But it does it’s job and is visible.
customer_reviews.author: Shabab

customer_reviews.title: They rattle.
customer_reviews.text: The blade will slip out if in your pocket. The lock button only needs a little pressure to move blade.
customer_reviews.author: Zut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Good quality. Great for breaking down Amazon boxes!
customer_reviews.author: BJR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months I am still using the first portion of blades.Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

COMFORTABLE ERGONOMIC HANDLE - Casing is also made from High Impact ABS Material
